# AVCaptureSlider

**Class**

A slider control that selects a value from a bounded range.

## Declaration

```swift
class AVCaptureSlider
```

## Overview

Sliders are appropriate for controls that provide a single float value.

## Creating a slider

- **init(_:symbolName:in:)**: Creates a continuous slider control that selects a value from a bounded range.
- **init(_:symbolName:in:step:)**: Creates a discrete slider control that selects a stepped value from a bounded range.
- **init(_:symbolName:values:)**: Creates a discrete slider control that selects a value from a list.

## Handling interaction

- **setActionQueue(_:action:)**: Sets the action to perform on the specified dispatch queue when the control’s value changes.

## Accessing the control value

- **value**: The current value of the slider.
- **prominentValues**: Values in this array may receive unique visual representations or behaviors.
- **localizedValueFormat**: A localized string that defines the presentation of the slider’s value.

## Setting an accessibility identifier

- **accessibilityIdentifier**: A string identifier for the slider.

## Inspecting presentation attributes

- **symbolName**: The name of the SF Symbol that represents this control.
- **localizedTitle**: A localized title that describes the control’s action.

## Capture controls

- **Enhancing your app experience with the Camera Control**: Provide direct access to your camera app’s features to help people quickly capture the perfect shot.
- **AVCaptureControl**: An abstract base class for controls that interact with the camera system.
- **AVCaptureSystemZoomSlider**: A control that adjusts the video zoom factor of a capture device within the system-recommended range.
- **AVCaptureSystemExposureBiasSlider**: A control that adjusts the exposure bias of a capture device within the system-recommended range.
- **AVCaptureIndexPicker**: A control for selecting from a set of mutually exclusive values by index.

## Inherits From

- AVCaptureControl

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
